name: Gallery Work (wip)
description:
(Due to reasons, this game could not be completed in time for the game jam. This is an unfinished version which will be succeeded by a proper update within the month. Thank you for your understanding.)

Game design by Dronaroid (@artdron)

Music by Leaf Let (@LetLeaf)

WASD+mouse: move/look

Spacebar: jump

Shift: run

Right mouse button: zoom
